FAQ.title: Have a Question with
FAQ.subTitle: Vidyarishi ?
description: Answer a few simple questions to discover the ideal online university for you available anytime, anywhere.

faqBody.heading: headingOne3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How do I select the best course for my career?
faqBody.desc: To select the best course, consider your career goals, interests, and current skill set. Research various courses that align with your aspirations and explore their syllabi, reviews, and potential job opportunities after completion. Our platform offers tools to help you compare courses based on subjects, career paths, and university ratings, making it easier to make an informed decision.

faqBody.heading: headingTwo3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How do I compare different universities?
faqBody.desc: You can compare universities using our comparison tool, which evaluates universities based on key factors such as student ratings, accreditation, course offerings, faculty, location, and costs. This will help you assess which universities best meet your educational and personal needs.

faqBody.heading: headingThree3
faqBody.accordionTitle: What are the prerequisites for enrolling in a course?
faqBody.desc: Each course may have its own set of prerequisites. Generally, these could include a certain level of prior education, specific qualifications, or foundational knowledge in the subject. You can find the prerequisites for each course listed on the course page, so be sure to check them before applying.

faqBody.heading: headingFour3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How do I contact the support team for assistance?
faqBody.desc: You can reach out to our support team via email, phone.

faqBody.heading: headingFive3
faqBody.accordionTitle: What payment options are available for courses?
faqBody.desc: We offer several payment options, including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and online payment platforms such as PayPal. You can choose the method most convenient for you during the checkout process. For installment plans or financial aid, please check the specific course or university details.

PartnerFAQ.title: Have Questions About
PartnerFAQ.subTitle: Becoming a Vidyarishi Partner?
description: Explore answers to frequently asked questions and learn how you can grow with Vidyarishi by becoming an education consultant or business partner.

faqBody.heading: headingOne3
faqBody.accordionTitle: What is the Vidyarishi Partner Program?
faqBody.desc: The Vidyarishi Partner Program is a unique opportunity for individuals, counselors, mentors, and education enthusiasts to become business partners and help students discover and enroll in top UGC-approved online universities. As a partner, you’ll receive complete access to our platform, training, and tools to start earning and growing your network.

faqBody.heading: headingTwo3
faqBody.accordionTitle: Is there any investment or joining fee?
faqBody.desc: No. There is zero investment required to become a Vidyarishi partner. You can start your journey without any financial commitment and begin earning commissions and incentives right away.

faqBody.heading: headingThree3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How do I earn as a partner?
faqBody.desc: You earn commissions for every successful student enrollment made through your referral or counseling. The more you guide, the more you earn. There’s no limit to your income potential, and you can track everything through our partner dashboard.

faqBody.heading: headingFour3
faqBody.accordionTitle: Do I need prior experience in education to join?
faqBody.desc: Not at all. Whether you’re new to education counseling or have years of experience, the Vidyarishi team provides full training, marketing materials, and continuous support to help you succeed as a partner.

faqBody.heading: headingFive3
faqBody.accordionTitle: How do I get support or assistance?
faqBody.desc: Our dedicated partner support team is available to assist you 24×7. Whether it's technical help, product queries, or onboarding guidance—we’ve got you covered.
